import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = (props) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const updateSearchText = (e) => { props.setGetInput(e.target.value); } const setInputText = (e) => { e.preventDefault(e); navigate('./search') props.setSearchText(props.getInput); props.setGetInput(""); document.getElementById('myinput').value = ''; } return (
Movie Browser
  • Home
  • Coming Soon
); }; export default Navbar;
